Лучший симулятор ненависти к крылатым п****.
Спрятался в шкаф, отошел поссать, прилетела ворона, тебя тащат к крюку.
Сидишь, ждёшь пока починят генератор, прилетела ворона, вся тима на крюках.
Крадёшься за маньяком, каркнула ворона, он обернулся, тебя тащат на крюк.
На тиммейте ворона, пробегает мимо тебя и прячется в шкаф, тебя тащат к крюку.
Хочешь заюзать сундучок в логове маньяка? Ждёшь пока он свалит и даже в темном подвале к тебе вернётся твой верный крылатый друг и спалит тебя.

Despite the negative opinions on this game it's one of my favorites. That being said the community is extremely toxic. It's not very welcoming and learning the ins-and-outs can be disheartening because of it. Regardless if you can manage to get into it, it's super fun. Being a survivor is actually scary, especially when you first start. Being a killer is really fun but it's hard to learn and even harder to win. I recommend this game if you are willing to face a frustrating challenge at the start.

This is my first review and I am happy to write one. This game exceeded my expectations. I played Friday the 13th and found that boring and repetitive and voicechat just terrible. After playing this for a couple of hours I bought all the DLC's and found myself watching the aftermath even after I died. I have screamed, laughed and nerd raged out in this game. Even screamed as the killer. Really good game and concept. My only suggestion is having survivors do something else besides power generators. A+

I do not recommend this game to anyone. I started playing it with the faith of it being fixed in the future. Spoiler alert: It will never be fixed.

Problems:
- easy to cheat in
(30% of the community used to progress cheat, and there is a 0% chance for them to get banned. Not talking about the other cheats.)

- Shitty support. 
(This covers most of it, but here is an example: If you lose your whole progress in the game(yes this was a thing) u have 0 chance getting it back, doesn't matter how hard you try)

- Toxic community 
(This game has one of the worst communities I have ever seen)

- Optimization 
(U will almost never be able to play this game at 144 fps, since it(directly from the devs) "was made for 60fps and not above"
Even increasing the fps cap above 60 and turning off the vsync requires you to tinker with the game files.
Going above 120 fps is just a dream for everyone)

The community for this game can be really toxic, both killers and survivors. But don't let that keep you away. It's a really fun game, especially if you love slasher flicks and if you just have fun with it and not take it too seriously.

The game is fun, especially with friends, as long as you play with others who are having fun.  The biggest trick to enjoy the game is to not take it too seriously.  Obviously, be mad if someone cheated, but if someone's just doing better against you than you'd wish, don't be salty.  Loading times may take forever occasionally, and skins can be considered too pricy, but overall, it's a fun game.
I recommend this game because of all the teamwork that you need, and the fun that you have playing the game.
I think they did a pretty good job so far!
Jogo Muito bom! Vale a pena
Buenisimo juego divertido

Quem gosta de gráficos bonito deve desconsiderar este game, possui uma Engine simples e jogabilidade limitada ao enredo. Suas habilidades ficam limitadas ao personagem que você joga e seus atributos que voce vai destravando conforme upa o mesmo. Dead by daylight possui um sistema de ranking bem simples também, vitória sobe, derrota desce,nada de inovador. Contudo, o jogo é bem divertido e viciante, mesmo sendo um jogo simplório perto dos atuais lançamentos, recomendo para quem gosta de jogar sem compromisso, apenas para se divertir.

El problema empieza cuando y por lo cual, estoy bastante disgustado, decepcionado y molesto, al tener tantos dlc y ser un juego p2p , no muchas personas pueden permitircelo  lo cual hace que muy poca gente este jugando, puedes pegarte horas en las colas especialmente para ser asesino y pagar solo para jugar de superviviente, no mola nada. Es un desperdicio de dinero, deberian agregar una opcion de partida rapida como friday 13, que te salga superviviente o asesino aleatoriamente y bajar el precio o algo, por que de seguir asi va terminar como EVOLVE un juegaso pero mas merto que nada.

I love this game. i bought it for halloween, for 50% off it was worth it, it would've been worth it even for its full price. it's fun with friends, or even alone, i prefer it alone to be honest, theres no communication so you just gotta stick with what you have and hope you have nice teammates. i suggest you to buy this game, you really won"t regret it. whats the only bad part of this game? the new killers, every time they release a new dlc with a new killer, it's broken. like freddy kueger, it's broken as hell, you don't see him but he can see you, the sound that gives you "warning" it's just not enough, and the dream thing is just..retarded? i don't really know. other than that, it's a really nice game. BUY IT.

A very fun and addicting game playing as killer or survivor. A good variety of survivors and killers too. Great levelling up/progression system to earn perks and addons etc. With new content being released quite frequently, it keeps the game fresh and wanting to come back for more (The Nightmare, The Shape and The Cannibal for example). A solid 10/10.

This game is sooo much fun.. literally the max. value you can get out of 20(!) bucks. The game's mechanics are pretty simple and therefore very friendly towards newcomers and "casual players".

To learn and understand the game the best while still having a s#!t ton of fun, I suggest to play both sides (survivor and killer) frequently, instead of "maining" one side only. At this point I want to mention that it is possible to play survivor with friends in a public match("Survive with Friends") vs a random killer or only with friends -the killer is being played by a friend as well- in a private/unranked match("Kill your Friends")

The balance of this game is definitely not in a perfect state yet and I as many others do not agree with all decisions the devs have made in the past, but it is getting better over time since release. The developers of this game [u]really[/u] care about this game, they released so much patches and new content over the last 16 months.
Just a lil' heads up: This game had 3 different killers and 4 different survivors at release. Now we have 10 killers and 11 survivors! (In case I didnt misscount).

The only real negative points I wanna mention here:
-the high rank meta can become a little bit stale, but new balance patches and a big variety of different killers definitely helps on that.

- the community(especially when you get closer to the higher ranks) is pretty toxic. especially the constant "survivor main vs killer main" flamewars are annoying. Since we have a so-called "soft-ban" system here in DbD to deal with any kind of misbehaviour, it got [u]tremendously[/u] better. Before, deaththreats, cancer-wishes and harassment on Steam with group invites were standard whenever you played killer.

- some flawed game design decisions (but it's getting better!)

TL;DR this game has a more than fair price. If you are a fan of the survival horror genre, just give it a shoot, not much you can do wrong with 20$. Keep in mind that you are also able to refund within the first 2h playtime on Steam :)

If you are still unsure, just check out some "Let's plays" on YouTube or some streams on Twitch

Hmmm, mam tą grę już tak długo i nie napisałem aż do teraz recenzji. Więc zacznijmy! DBD to gra, która mnie od samego początku wciągnęła. Grafika, muzyka i tryb gry survivorem [tryb za pleców postaci] są bardzo klimatyczne. Co do gry to faktem jest, by dobrze zacząć w nią grać trzeba trochę spędzić czasu - ale warto. Mimo, że do gry twórcy dodają płatne DLC to również wychodzą darmowe nowe zawartości. Nie ma tu P2W. W grze nie widzę minusów, bo widać, że twórcy starają się tą grę cały czas rozwijać. Jedyne co mnie trochę boli to sprawa w grze tzw. Camperów [Owe osoby stoją pod hakiem cały czas i czekają aż survivor zginie] oraz cheaterów. Wiadomo, nie da się tego zniwelować do 100% ale warto takie osoby zgłaszać przez system reportowania w grze oraz na steamie. Podsumuwując, uważam tą grę za wartą kupna.

I don't usually leave reviews for games BUT I chose to leave a review on this EPIC game. Perhaps the best asymmetrical online survival horror game wihout any doube!. Coming from a horror movies/games fan, this game is a must have especially if you have friends to play with.
The game idea is simple, as a survivor you need to survive! fix generators to power up the gates and escape, help your teammates and make the killers life harder by sabbotaging their hooks!.
As a Killer, earn your title :). 
The game play is great. I saw and heard people criticizing various aspects of the game but I totally disagree with that, for instance:
1. Third person view a survivor and 1st as a killer: I think this is great and makes the game fair and balanced especially since survivors can't fight back.
2. Lack of weapons: Honestly, that the true fun of this game, you are absolutely defenseless! however, you can still use the environment to your advantage, along some of your characters perks. If you want to use weapons to beat the killer, then play Friday 13th (which tbh I didn't quite liked) or Evolve!
3. Paid DLCs: The game without DLCs is still great and tbh relatively cheap! moreover, you can still still play against DLC killers/survivors even if you don't have the DLCs which is good. Besides, if you want copyrighted characters like Freddy Kreuger and Michale Myers then obviously that won't be free!

Graphics: They aren't topnotch but who cares! the game is absolutely amazing besides what do you expect from an Indie game!.. and tbh the graphics imo are still better than most bethesda games graphics (which is a AAA company)

Overall, I think this is the counterstrike of the horror genre... simple, addictive and great fun!
It is  so funny

Dbd at its core is an amazing game. The problem is the community and developers being unable to balance the game and fix issues. 

When you first start playing you'll think killers are extremly powerful and if you're going up against a more experinced killers in the lower ranks you'll almost certainly will die, so will your whole team. But as you progress and learn more, you'll quickly notice just how weak the killer role really is. 

At the highest rank, the only viable killers are Nurse, Spirit and Blight. All of them have strong mobility and can counter loops. Hag comes close but the three mentioned above are better in my opinion. Then you've got every single basic m1 killer who can't hold their own against strong survivors, especially SWFs. Both sides have second chance perks but the survivors have far more that are harder to counter, while killers really only have a few, NOED being the strongest. These second chance perks ruin the game experience for both sides in my opinion. Yet these perks never get nerfed. Stealth is also not very viable in this game and most of the times you'll be better off looping the killer than trying to hide from them. 

The DBD community is by far, the most toxic community I've ever seen. You'll certinaly need to have some real thick skin in order to enjoy this game. You will get facecamped and tunneled as a survivor, and you will get tbagged and called trash as killer. But that's not the worst part, entitled dbd players (Mostly survivors) will literally have the audacity to come to your profile and -rep you and call you bad things if you killed them. 

Not only that, but the game suffers from hackers too. Played against one myself yesterday as a killer. It takes a solid 15 minutes to get into a killer game and to have the whole match ruined because of hackers really sucks. There's nothing you can do except staring into a wall and wait until they all escape. 

In conclusion, BHVR cares more about people buying their cosmetics and battle pass ripoff than actually fixing issues in the game.
